thread.title: Debt reduction is key for Brazil to grow again, Levy says
thread.title_full: Debt reduction is key for Brazil to grow again, Levy says | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Debt reduction is key for Brazil to grow again, Levy says
text: BRASILIA Oct 19 The Brazilian government has sent clear signals to market participants that stabilizing the national debt is a pre-condition for growth in the future, Finance Minister Joaquim Levy said on Monday. (Reporting by Marcela Ayres; Editing by David Gregorio ; Writing by Guillermo Parra-Bernal)
